name: Light Headache
Headache
Severe Headache
Splitting Headache
desc: You feel slight pulsing pain in your head.
The pain in your head is starting to affect your thinking.
You can barely keep your focus due to the pain in your head.
You are unable to focus.  Your head is pounding.
apply_message: Your head starts pulsing with pain.
remove_message: You notice that your brain no longer hurts.

name: Muscle Soreness
Muscle Strain
Muscle Pain
Muscle Agony
desc: Your muscles feel a litte sore.
The muscle tension starts to affect your range of motion.
The pain in your muscles is distracting.
apply_message: The muscles in your body start to hurt.

name: Joint Tightness
Joint Stiffness
Joint Rigidity
Joint Lock
desc: Your joints feel a little tight.
It is as if your joints are starting to resist you.
It has become difficult to move your body.
apply_message: You can feel your joints tightening.
remove_message: Your joints no longer feel restained.

name: Slight Blurred Vision
Blurred Vision
Intense Blurred Vision
Can't See Straight
desc: You start finding it difficult to focus your eyes.
The focal point of your eyes is shifting against your will.
Looking at something for more than a second is a challenge.
You are legally blind in the state of Maine.  The top of your head hurts.
apply_message: Your eyesight blurs all of a sudden.
remove_message: You can finally see straight again.
